definitions.body: king of Judah, son Azarish (LXX )Iwaqam, )Iwaqan, )Iwnaqan) 2Ki 15:5, 2Ki 15:7, 2Ki 15:30, 2Ki 15:32, 2Ki 15:36, 2Ki 15:38, 2Ki 16:1, 1Ch 3:12, 1Ch 5:17, 2Ch 26:21, 2Ch 26:23, 2Ch 27:1, 2Ch 27:6, 2Ch 27:7, 2Ch 27:9, Is 1:1, Is 7:1, Ho 1:1, Mic 1:1.
youngest son of Jerubbaal (Giddeon) Ju Jdg 9:5, Jdg 9:7, Jdg 9:21, Jdg 9:57 (LXX ut supr.; Codd. )Iwqam, )Iwaqam).
